reviewText: This dvd is great to own. Dic is really trying to release the classics again and that's what we need. I actually like the episode entitled, "The lost Mushroom." Indiana Joe has no face but yet he can talk. I found that funny when I was younger and I still do to this day. I also like the episode of "Robo Koopa." Have kids? Get them they're favorite bowl of something, sit them down, and put this on for them. They'll be entertained! You won't regret getting this. The hole family can dnjoy this because you don't have to worry about violence in the cartoons. It's lots of comic misschiff and loads of fun to watch and laugh at.

I think the super mario bros. super show is great but I was disappointed to see that 3/5 episodes were already released on mario's greatest movie moments. The 2 episodes on this dvd that have not yet been released are Star Koopa and James Blonde. If you don't have mario's greatest movie moments then I suggest you buy it, but I still think they should have made volume 2.
Great value
very cute
great
Gonna havto get some more Mario DVDs the grandsons love Mario!!

This was a gift for a 5 year olds birthday party..  The family went out of town for Spring Break and the mother told me that the movie was a great idea as it kept her boys entertained on the drive.  They love this movie and watch it over and over again.
I guess we never left feedback. It's been about 7 years since we got this. They grow so fast. *sigh*
this was bought for our grandson. As far as we know he likes this. we have not heard any thing different.
this is a old cartoon and bad quality i will not buy more of them is ok for kids i guess
My child loves this video--great for you get kids and older kids.  Would buy many more and will like do just that!
The graphics are old.  The jokes are lame.  But that is MY opinion.  The opinion of my 3 & 5 year old boys is that it is hilarious and they want to watch it again and again.
He always makes for a boys gift and having a good time. The new 3DS ones are up to $50
My 6 year old loves all things Mario. This movie was a perfect fit. It is great for kids.  Very happy with order.

Great video for the little ones to play with along with mario actions figures purchased previously.  The kids now play the video in the car on long  trips. Thanks for getting us to this quickly for the summer trips.

It's a magnificent DVD if you know what to excpect, but a fair warning, this is nothing special.
It's not a show you've never heard of; it's the classic "Super Mario Bros. Super Show". I don't exactly know WHY they didn't put the full title on it this time, but don't be fooled; it's the SMB super show once you see it.

Bought this for my son and daughter who really got into these older Mario cartoons.  They have enjoyed watching the same cartoons I grew up with, and to me these make more sense than the ones on cartoon network these days.
Got this for my seven year old son.  He is everything Mario and loves this DVD just as much as the others.

I found this in a bargain bin in some store and I had no idea what it was. When I purchased it, it turned out to be five episodes of The Super Mario Bros. Super Show. Why couldn't they just call it that. What sucks is that the live action part of the show is completely gone with just the cartoon shows left. The episode included are Star Koopa, Toad Warriors, Robo Koopa, On Her Majesty's Sewer Service, and Raiders of the Lost Mushroom. The show is pretty funny if extremely corny, but if you are a fan of the show I suggest searching for a boxed set instead of this.
If your kids love Mario and Star Wars - then this is a must buy.  My kids love it.  They keep running around saying, "May the PASTA be with you.".

Most kids go through fazes of different things they like.  I bought this dvd and it seems he does not care for mario anymore, but once he gets a DS and plays mario bros, he might want to watch this dvd.
my 7 year old loves these dvds.  great buy for us, I personally think they could be made better (have more mario game graphics) but who am i to say anyway?
My little boy received this for his birthday.  He liked watching it because he loves Super Mario Bros. I think it was a good buy, especially for a Mario lover.
This was purchased as a gift for my 5 year old grandson.  I haven't watched the DVD, but I haven't heard of any problems with it.  Shipping was quick.  Everything went great.
Was very pleased with the product.  I recieved in less than a week and the item was brand new, sealed and never opened.  My kids love it.
My kids are pleased with the movie, especilly my 4 year old son, whom this was bought for.
My son loves this and it is just the same as I remember it.  Though it is quite corny to watch, great show for kids.
My kids love these Mario cartoons.  Any kids that love Nintendo would like these.  Some of them have Zelda as well.

I ordered this cartoon because I thought it was unusual looking and I didn't have it. But people....be warned!  Don't buy this if you already own the SUPER MARIO BROS.SUPER SHOW box sets on DVD! The 5 episodes on this DVD is from the SUPER SHOW cartoon! I didn't know that when I ordered it! I'll probably just give this to my niece now.

I want to see more of the New Super Mario Bros, or Super Mario World. i am not as addicted to the Mario Bros. as I am with The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. I love the turtles. I grew up watching the original series. I will collect all the episodes regardless of how much money I do spend. Hey, it's worth spending money on something that really interests you. How do I feel about the new Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and the movie "TMNT"? Well, it is not as intense, entertaining, and emotional as the original one and the following three movies in which the turtles were real. They were not 3D animated like TMNT. The original is always better than something that duplicates it. Today's music and TV shows are crappy, senseless, and a waste of someone's time.

This video is a lot of fun.  It's really long, and it's definitely classic Super Mario Bros.  My kids ask for it over and over.
Also check out the Super Mario Bros King Koopa Katastrophe.  That's good too!  Highly recommend these DVDs!
This movie has a good and decent story for kids to watch.  It is entertaining and without inmoralities.  My son likes to watch it often and carries it everywhere.
Great.
we like this.
Grandson will definitely love this - Mario Mario Mario
My 4yr old loves this movie he's obsessed anything with Mario. These are way better then my 4yr old watching Mario on YouTube.
I Never received the movie. All I got was an empty case with no DVD on it. Very disappointed
A PLUS
Kids love it.
This is so fun!  Takes me back!  My kids love it!
Great movie. Great seller. My son loves it!
Such a cute gift. Friends son loved this :)
